XStreamMarshallerFactory - Class in org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.ser
Exposes configuration options that are not made available by the Spring XStreamMarshaller class.

XStreamMarshallerFactory.LocalConverterHolder - Class in org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.ser
Encapsulates the properties of a "local" XStream converter: the Converter instance itself, the Class containing the field to be converted, and the name of the field to be converted.
